text: Ezɨ akam inigha izir gumazim atrivim mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze: Kɨ faragha ia mɨkeme, ia mɨdorozim gamir dughiamɨn, ia apaniba bar me mɨsueghtɨ me arɨmɨghiregh. Ezɨ nɨ Benhadat ataghizɨ an arav ghuzɨ, an mɨdorozir gumaziba uaghan are. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ an danganim inigh aremegham. Eghtɨ nɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba an mɨdorozir gumazibar danganiba inigh bar ikuvigham.”
